body_html:
I had also to change these lines in this file https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl#L858:

858  genrules.append(_symlink_genrule_for_dir(repository_ctx,
859       cuda_toolkit_path + extras/CUPTI/include",
860       "extras/CUPTI/include", "cuda-extras"))

to these:

858  genrules.append(_symlink_genrule_for_dir(repository_ctx,
859       cuda_toolkit_path,
860       "extras/CUPTI/include", "cuda-extras"))

to these:

body:
I had also to change these lines in this file https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/cuda_configure.bzl#L858:

```
858  genrules.append(_symlink_genrule_for_dir(repository_ctx,
859       cuda_toolkit_path + extras/CUPTI/include",
860       "extras/CUPTI/include", "cuda-extras"))
```
to these:

```
858  genrules.append(_symlink_genrule_for_dir(repository_ctx,
859       cuda_toolkit_path,
860       "extras/CUPTI/include", "cuda-extras"))

```
